summary: This bill, the Joint Chiefs Reauthorization Act of 2025, aims to reauthorize and make revisions to the Joint Chiefs Landscape Restoration Partnership program. It amends the Infrastructure Investment and Jobs Act to expand the program's scope to include wildfire recovery and enhancement of natural resources. The bill also specifies agency coordination between the Natural Resources Conservation Service and the Forest Service, and clarifies restrictions related to special areas and roadless areas. Finally, it extends the authorization period through 2031.
